title: In Jahangirpuri, bulldozers leave trail of despair: ‘What have they proved with this?’ - The Indian Express
content: In Jahangirpuri, bulldozers leave trail of despair: ‘What have they proved with this?’  The Indian Express
description: The Delhi municipal corporation's snap anti-encroachment demolition drive, a few days after a Hanuman Jayanti procession in the area sparked communal violence, has left in its wake a trail of devastation and despair, cutting across fault lines.
